characters.story: "CHYUNG?" the jewel questions curiously - is this fine jade or green jade?
"LIN?" the jewel questions curiously - a beautiful gem often used in girls' names.
"JYOON!" the metal sings cheerfully - thirty catties, about 15 kg, often in boys' names!
"YOH," the mouth says neutrally - Oh! Like "yo!" between teens!
"PAO!" the stone commands sharply - a cannon firing artillery!
"SOH!" the flowers sing cheerfully as we search for them - to seek and find!
"FOO?" the flower questions curiously - hibiscus, the first part, like a lotus flower.
"RUNG?" the flower questions curiously - hibiscus, the second part, cottonrose bloom!
Biang hole flesh 2 cocoons words 2 long braids horse saber heart road questions "Byahng?" curiously - complex noodle!
Tread on wooden leg float commands sharply "Jyen!" - step fulfill promise!
"JAO!" he commands sharply when introducing himself - the surname Zhao, like from the ancient dynasty!
